title: 65% winrate what the hell......

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Skarner when played Jungle. Statistics include Skarner's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Skarner Jungle is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
This is higher than release {{champion:143}}!

Batshit insane, personally I don't understand why he's so overpowered right now. His new passive is essentially a passive for the enemy team, and his DPS outside of the crystals is much lower. His new E is great though, he can actually gank pre-6 solid now.

And why does no one build {{item:3057}} on him anymore?

replies.body: In the lategame he has a 700 health shield on a 5 seconds cooldown. That's most likely his biggest issue
